same. Despite his support for Barack Obama , Colin Powell would make no commitment yet for the 2012 John McCain House race." I will always vote for the person who I think is best qualified," he said. I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates. I have not yet seen anybody on the Republican side that I am ready to commit to and I am not committed to Barack Obama either.

then-candidate Barack Obama in the 2008 election, but said Sunday on CNN's" State of the Union" that he will wait to make a decision on whom to support in the next presidential election. I'm not committed to Barack Obama . I'm not committed to a Republican candidate, Colin Powell told CNN Chief Political Correspondent Candy Crowley ." I am not committed to any candidate until I see all the candidates and finally see who the two candidates are who are going for this position.""
